tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    teacher_id INT,
    teacher_feedback TEXT,
    peer_id INT,
    peer_feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FeedbackSession (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    teacher_id INT,
    peer_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (teacher_id) REFERENCES TeacherFeedback(teacher_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (peer_id) REFERENCES PeerFeedback(peer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  rating INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_by VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  feedback_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_relationship (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_id INT,
  peer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (teacher_id) REFERENCES teachers(teacher_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (peer_id) REFERENCES peers(peer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Teachers (
  teacher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  subject VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE Students (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  grade INT,
  age INT
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Courses (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(50),
  teacher_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Peers (
  peer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  peer_name VARCHAR(50),
  feedback_id INT,
  recommendation TEXT
)
